mn23:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn23:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kumārakassapo andhavane viharati.
mn23:1.4: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ andhavanaṃ obhāsetvā yenāyasmā kumārakassapo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā āyasmantaṃ kumārakassapaṃ etadavoca:
mn23:2.1: “Bhikkhu bhikkhu, ayaṃ vammiko rattiṃ dhūmāyati, divā pajjalati.
mn23:2.4: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa laṅgiṃ
mn23:2.9: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa uddhumāyikaṃ.
mn23:2.14: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa dvidhāpathaṃ.
mn23:2.19: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa caṅgavāraṃ.
mn23:2.24: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa kummaṃ.
mn23:2.29: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa asisūnaṃ.
mn23:2.34: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa maṃsapesiṃ.
mn23:2.39: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa nāgaṃ.
mn23:2.42: ‘tiṭṭhatu nāgo, mā nāgaṃ ghaṭṭesi; namo karohi nāgassā’ti.
mn23:2.43: Ime kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, pañhe bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā puccheyyāsi, yathā ca te bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṃ dhāreyyāsi.
mn23:2.44: Nāhaṃ taṃ, bhikkhu, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yo imesaṃ pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena cittaṃ ārādheyya aññatra tathāgatena vā, tathāgatasāvakena vā, ito vā pana sutvā”ti—
mn23:3.1: Atha kho āyasmā kumārakassapo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā kumārakassapo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn23:3.2: “imaṃ, bhante, rattiṃ aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ andhavanaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho, bhante, sā devatā maṃ etadavoca:
mn23:3.3: ‘bhikkhu bhikkhu, ayaṃ vammiko rattiṃ dhūmāyati, divā pajjalati.
mn23:3.10: Ko nu kho, bhante, vammiko, kā rattiṃ dhūmāyanā, kā divā pajjalanā, ko brāhmaṇo, ko sumedho, kiṃ satthaṃ, kiṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ, kā laṅgī, kā uddhumāyikā, ko dvidhāpatho, kiṃ caṅgavāraṃ, ko kummo, kā asisūnā, kā maṃsapesi, ko nāgo”ti?
mn23:4.1: “‘Vammiko’ti kho, bhikkhu, imassetaṃ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa adhivacanaṃ, mātāpettikasambhavassa odanakummāsūpacayassa aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammassa. (1)
mn23:4.2: Yaṃ kho, bhikkhu, divā kammante ārabbha rattiṃ anuvitakketi anuvicāreti—
mn23:4.4: Yaṃ kho, bhikkhu, rattiṃ anuvitakketvā anuvicāretvā divā kammante payojeti kāyena vācāya ‘manasā’—
mn23:4.6: ‘Brāhmaṇo’ti kho, bhikkhu, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
mn23:4.12: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (8)
mn23:4.15: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (9)
mn23:4.18: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (10)
mn23:4.19: ‘Caṅgavāran’ti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ, seyyathidaṃ—
mn23:4.22: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (11)
mn23:4.23: ‘Kummo’ti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacanaṃ, seyyathidaṃ—
mn23:4.26: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (12)
mn23:4.28: cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ piyarūpānaṃ kāmūpasaṃhitānaṃ rajanīyānaṃ,
mn23:4.32: kāyaviññeyyānaṃ phoṭṭhabbānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ piyarūpānaṃ kāmūpasaṃhitānaṃ rajanīyānaṃ.
mn23:4.34: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (13)
mn23:4.37: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (14)
mn23:4.39: Tiṭṭhatu nāgo, mā nāgaṃ ghaṭṭesi; namo karohi nāgassāti ayametassa attho”ti. (15)
mn23:4.41: Attamano āyasmā kumārakassapo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
